main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified flying objects in Oregon in April 1952.
interesting points: The first sighting involved 3 disc-shaped objects with shiny metallic surfaces observed moving fast in formation,The sighting duration was 2 minutes,The second reported sighting included a ground observer tracking an object for over 2 minutes at an estimated altitude of 20,000 to 30,000 feet,The estimated speed of the object was over 1,700 mph,The sightings were reported by two observers with no other evidence confirming the event.
sighted object: three disc-shaped objects with shiny metallic surfaces
witness description: ground observers tracking the objects visually
